Champagne
KRUG
Krug Grande Cuvée Champagne
Made from the finest wines from the Marne district of Champagne,
Krus Grande Cuvee is known throushout the world for its
unique qua mes or elegance. tine mousse and distinctive lavour.
Skilful blending under the personal control of Henri Krug
makes the Grande Cuvee an exceptonal v harmonious
champagne in the unique Krug style.
Red Wines
LYNCH * BAGES
Château Lynch Bages 1986
Château Lynch Bages has been given high accolade among the connoisseurs.
The colour of this 1986 Lynch Bages is of a lovely depth, and the bouquet is soft
and aromatic with a distinctive suggestion of cedar and cassis. It is full bodied,
concentrated and dense with huge texture. A wine of massive dimensions and great promise.
WINE LIST
Kendall-Jackson Grand Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 1994
The grapes used to produce the 1994 vintage Kendall Jackson Grand
Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon were grown in California's best mountain vinevards alongside
the famed Napa and Sonoma valleys. This is a distinctive red wine which offers concentrated flavours
or black cherry, blueberry and plum fruit with subtle chocolate and toasty oak notes.
White
Wines
Robert Mondavi Napa Valley Chardonnay 1996
This 1996 Nappa Valley Chardonnay has layers of tropical fruit, pear and
citrus favours with a toastv creamv nuance. A orv wine which is a de icious
accompaniment for creamy pasta or risotto dishes, seafood and other white meats.
GREEN POINT
Green Point Yarra Valley Chardonnay 1996
The 1996 Green Point Chardonnay was produced from
Chardonnay grapes grown in the Yarra Valley in Australia. Brilliant straw
yellow in colour, it has a combination of varietal fruit balanced with oak. I his wine
is a perfect accompaniment to seafood and white meat dishes.
MEUKJAULT
Louis Max Meursault
Les Casse-Têtes 1990
This wine is classed as one of the most famous white wines of France and is produced
from fine Chardonnay grapes grown on the rolling slopes of Meursault. Gold coloured,
with tints of greenish gold. it is characterized by powerful aromas of ripe fruit and discriminating flavour
of hazelnuts. This particular well balanced vintage is a dream and definitely one to remember.
It is Cathay Pacific policy not to serve alcoholic beverages to persons under 18 years of age.
CX838, 839, 888, 889 1-8-99
